body: How come this awesome doujin doesn't get much attention ?
Mythra and Pyra are very beautiful. Rex is one lucky guy
Hey so does anyone know what computer program the author could have used to make this hentai, id really want to try doing it myself

I was wanting a sequel to this beautiful series for a very long time, It Is a sequel done right since It takes what made the first part even better with more sex positions, and those porno like camera angles from pages 19 to 20 which I would say Is a staple of this author. The story was the typical bitch In heat one but It served since the actual plot was very strong In this one from the way he draws the facial expressions to the way he makes the vagina look sweet and tasty. The lack of actual blowjob scenes sadly hurt this one a bit since the last one did have one or two and I thought this would have more what with both of them In here somewhat but that was not meant to be sadly, the artistic style, however, was the bomb with the way he can draw separations In the various body parts of the characters and highlight them to match their overall mood right now Is excellent. All In all, I rate this work a 9/10 and the only reason It misses a point Is due to the lack of blowjob scenes.
